data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the county of Orne, Normandie, France.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Orne, Normandie, France
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Orne, Normandie, France.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.section_summary: On average, 31 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Orne, Normandie, France.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.

Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Orne with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Orne, Normandie, France to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Argentan
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Argentan, Normandie, France.
Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 302,000 people living in Orne, Normandie, France. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Orne, Normandie, France be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.section_summary:
the county of Orne, Normandie, France has a population of 302,000.

We estimate Orne has 3,711 people who might know Jesus, 184,679 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 113,610 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 81 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Orne words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."
